data.text:
Unfortunately, I would not return to this hotel. 
First time to Barcelona and upon arrival, the hotel lobby/ reception looked tatty and worn out- certainly, not what is shown in the advertisement images, definitely needs an update!

It also had a very pungent smell of drains or sewerage. This smell continued into our room which was on the fourth floor, notably in the bathroom. 

The carpets leading to the rooms appeared dirty, it was not what I expected at all, leaving us feeling very underwhelmed indeed.

The room stipulated a court yard view but I’d have ad a better view at Manchester Strangeways HMP. 

However, the room was clean and did offer refreshments that you were charged for, no freebies.

Tea and coffee in the room but for some reason, no milk was provided. 

What was strange, is that we had a double bed but two single quilts covering it. 

Sadly, will not be returning. It’s only redeeming feature- the location which was good.
data.title: Will Not Return.

data.text:
This location, staff, cleanliness, room view and ALL was top notch, would definitely stay again. 
I used the metro pass and the bus stop outside the hotel and subway stop also outside the hotel were ideal for me as a solo traveler. I’ve only stayed at this Sonder location, but will speak to it being worth it.
data.title: Amazing

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Erin, we're thrilled to hear that you had an amazing experience with us. It's wonderful to know that you enjoyed our location, city team, views, and services. Your feedback means a lot to us, and we would be honored to welcome you back for another stay in the future.
owner_response.author: Sonder Team

data.text: We booked 3 nights at Sonder Los Arcos in Bari Gothic, having previously experienced an exceptional stay at a Sonder in Milan.  Our room in Bari Gothic was pristine. Definitely exceeded our expectations. Unfortunately noise from a club located in the same building or next door kept us awake all night. Our fault for booking in that area! (Perfect for 20s and 30s :-) We spoke to Ricardo at the front desk the next morning, who graciously agreed to  find us a room in another Sonder hotel in the Gracia area of Barcelona.  Again, the room was perfect. All of the staff we came into contact with were professional, extremely accommodating and a pleasure to meet. If we could give 10 stars, we would. Thank you for your outstanding service, Ricardo and Sonder hotels.
data.title: Outstanding

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, Estefann. We apologize for the noise disturbance caused by the nearby club, and we appreciate your understanding regarding the location's ambiance. We're thrilled that the room met your expectations and that you found all of our city team to be professional. Thank you for choosing us, and if you ever find yourself back in Barcelona, we would be honored to host you again.
owner_response.author: Sonder Team

data.text:
I had the best time during my stay at Sonder Casa Luz. The decor of the whole hotel, but especially the room was amazing. Check in process was super easy, and I was able to leave my bags before my room was ready. The room was beautiful, massive comfy bed, amazing shower, can’t fault it at all. 

I also visited the hotel rooftop bar/restaurant on my first night. The cocktails were amazing, and the bartender even made me some that were not on the menu, and was very easy to talk too (as I was travelling on my own, this was much appreciated!)

Overall, I could not fault this place at all. I have already booked another Sonder stay, this time in Edinburgh, but I would love to come and stay at Casa Luz again!
data.title: amazing stay!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful experience at Sonder Casa Luz! We are delighted to hear that you had the best time and enjoyed the amazing decor and comfortable bed.  Your kind words are truly appreciated.
Our top priority is your satisfaction and we're thrilled to see you had such an amazing time. We hope you have an equally delightful stay in Edinburgh!
owner_response.author: Sonder Team

data.text:
The location is very good. Easily accessible with Aerobus A2. Walkable distance to most of the tourist attractions such as the Casa Batllo and La Ramba. The staff service was awesome, in particular the timely whatsapp communication. The room was clean, spacious and the balcony was lovely. The central heater making the room temperature very comfortable. 

One deduction point was that the hotel roof top restaurant wasn't opened on the night we stayed. Not sure if it's because of the the Three Festival when we arrived the city.
data.title: Wonderful vacation stay next to the tourist attractions

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review, Michelle. We're delighted to hear that you found our location convenient, and we appreciate your kind words about our staff. It's great to know that our cleanliness and spaciousness met your expectations. We apologize for the inconvenience regarding the closure of the rooftop restaurant on the night of your stay. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us!
owner_response.author: Sonder Team
